title: Where is this? (Location)
answer:
📍 Hi po!
Thank you for your interest!
Alta Vida Estates is located in San Rafael, Bulacan — right in front of Bulacan State University San Rafael, about 15 minutes away from SM Baliuag. 🏡✨

Would you like me to show you more project photos or nearby landmarks?

title: What’s the TCP / Price?
answer:
💰 Hi po!
For our Diana Model Unit, Total Contract Price starts around ₱1.2M — with flexible payment terms.

We also have an early move-in promo and low downpayment option for qualified buyers!

Would you like me to check if you qualify for the promo? 💚

title: When is the Turnover Date?
answer:
🏡 Hi po!
Turnover for Alta Vida Estates units is within 24 months from reservation date.

We also have an early move-in promo, so you may qualify to move in sooner depending on your chosen payment plan. ✨

Would you like me to connect you with one of our brokers for full details?

buttons.label: Yes, connect me to a broker
